org.fcrepo.auth.xacml

Class XACMLAuthorizationDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fcrepo.auth.roles.common.AbstractRolesAuthorizationDelegate
      • org.fcrepo.auth.xacml.XACMLAuthorizationDelegate
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.fcrepo.auth.common.FedoraAuthorizationDelegate, org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware

    @Component(value="fad")
public class XACMLAuthorizationDelegate
extends org.fcrepo.auth.roles.common.AbstractRolesAuthorizationDelegate
implements org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware
    Responsible for resolving Fedora's permissions within ModeShape via a XACML Policy Decision Point (PDP).
    Author:
    Gregory Jansen
